Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: Dark purple in colour with red hues. Fresh plum and subtle vanilla oak with hints of violets and floral aromas. The generous silky palate has blueberry and plum fruit, complemented by soft, supple tannins with hints of milk chocolate and warm spices. Bright fruit flavours linger during the long succulent finish.

Name: Hey Malbec
Wine Description: Juicy black fruits combine with violets and black pepper, with soft and ripe tannins leading a soft and opulent finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Lively and fresh, it exhibits a nose bright red cherry, cranberry, and raspberry aromas and flavors, a juicy core of fruit, and hints of minerals and earth on the finish.

Name: Crognolo Toscana
Wine Description: Intense ruby red colour is the prelude to a full bouquet of ripe cherry and berries well blended with spicy notes that give class and complexity.Full bodied, well balanced and vibrant on the palate, well rounded tannins and depth

Name: MIXT
Wine Description: The blackberry and dark cherry nuances are accented by spicy notes of white pepper and black olive. Deep and rich, the blend has a long finish with a nice balance of acidity and tannin.

Name: Classic Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has aromatic and intense with a rich, full body.

Name: Armador Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ruby color with hints of violets. An important feature of this vintage are the distinctive aromas displaying fresh red fruit such as strawberries and plums, as well as its well known aromas of liquorice, anis and a touch of vanilla, chocolate and champignon.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: San Simeon Merlot expresses rich flavors of blackberry and cassis. Aromas of black fruit greet the nose, while barrel aging contributes nuances of brown sugar and oak spice. Well-integrated tannins offer texture and a plush mouthfeel.

Name: English Hill Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The aromas and flavors, featuring beautiful red cherry fruit and earthiness are buttressed by its medium bodied frame. With air, the wine develops complexity and transparently reflects its clonal heritage.

Name: San Bastiano Grignolino del Monferrato Casalese
Old Vines Zinfandel
Wine Description: This rich, medium-bodied wine reveals abundant aromas of dark red berries, cherry compote and warm spice. Lingering, bright flavors follow, with notes of boysenberry pie, fresh cranberry and a touch of white pepper. The finish is long, smooth and a little spicy.

Name: Valpolicella Superiore
Wine Description: It is a deep ruby color with a spicy, peppery tobacco-scented nose with mineral touches. It also offers jammy red fruits, sherry and hints of coffee. The wine is elegant and has a distinguished aromatic complexity. A rich, fresh, fat, full-bodied wine with sweet tannin and a long finish.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Fruity and fine red wine, with subtle notes of rose and eucalyptus. Elegant with a medium bodied structure,finishing on velvety and rounded tannins.

Name: Gravels Grenache
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Vegetarian, Poultry, Spicy food

Name: Bordeaux
Wine Description: A pretty deep color, the Cuvée Classic is intense in the nose and develops aromas of red fruits accompanied by a slight spicy note. The attack is flexible with a pleasant tannic evolution.

Name: Fusion Dry Red
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Poultry, Game (deer, venison)
Wine Description: Ruby Medium Intensity, youthful, black cherry, blackberry, violets Medium Bodied, dry, medium acidity, light tannin, moderate intensity, medium finish, plum, blackberry, black cherry.

Name: Spätburgunder
Wine Description: In the nose this wine is characterized by an elegant interplay of ripe cherries as well as various berry fruits such as blackberry, wild strawberries and blueberries, as well as discreetly subtle spicy notes of juniper and violets, which can also be found on the palate. A soft wine with round tannins and good substance, the classic of an Ahrburgunders parchthin.

Name: Marchese di Villamarina
Wine Description: It has ruby red. Intense, lingering with delicious wafts of red berry fruits mingling attractively with notes of vanilla and burgeoning suggestions of spiciness.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Striking boysenberry and cassis fruit is layered with vanilla, dark chocolate and star anise aromas. Displays velvety richness throughout the soul of this young hipster. Its jammy, ripe berry flavors are enhanced with sweet oak and cola notes. Chewy tannins create a mesmerizingly balanced but powerful wine.

Name: Nebbiolo Langhe Capisme-e
Wine Description: It has very full and intense ruby color, the nose is already pleasant, with fruity and floral notes and a spicy vaguest recollection. In the mouth it is round already, quite soft, although acidity and tannins are still alive.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Medium red slightly high-toned aromas of cranberry cherry and licorice baking spice wild sage balsam and classic cherry coulis fine tannins and bright juicy acidity give structure to the red berry palate.

Name: California Series Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich, full, and lush on entry. Red plum, Bing cherry, and raspberry torte create a velvety mid-palate with a touch of lavender and black cherry. Polished, soft tannins with cedar, dark chocolate, and savory notes produce a lengthy finish.

Name: Nahalal
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Poultry, Game (deer, venison)

Name: Old Vine  Zinfandel
Wine Description: Aromas of ripe blackberry,cherry with layers of oak and spice, rich berry,chocolate flavors balanced with black pepper.

Name: Merlot Reserve
Wine Description: Medium-bodied with flavors of cherry and plum accented with spice notes and a juicy finish.

Name: Saumur-Champigny La Folie
Wine Description: Saumur-Champigny “La Folie”: 100% Cabernet Franc. Biodynamically farmed and certified organic. La Folie comes from plots in the village of Champigny itself with vines ranging from 15-50 years in age. Clay and limestone soils. Hand-harvested. Native yeast fermentation in 50 hl concrete vats for 4 weeks. Aged for 12 months in half 38 hl foudre and half in 4-5 year old barriques. Bottled unfined and unfiltered.

Name: Cité de Carcassonne Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: A crimson robe. A nose of subtle raspberry, rhubarb, spice and tobacco aromas. In the mouth the elegant and silky tannins bring a very feminine touch to this wine.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep garnet in color with bright reflections. Aromas of ripe berries, cassis, plum and dark cherry, followed by light toast notes. Juicy red berry and mocha flavors with a full-bodied structure, balanced by smooth tannins and a lengthy finish.

Name: Verduno Pelaverga
Wine Description: Its elegant pale ruby with black reflections and white rim. Its bouquet is intense with sandalwood and berry fruit mingled with some greenish accents and pleasant spice. It has ample and rich palate, with greenish spicy sandalwood and some greenish accents, mingled with nutmeg and hints of cardamom berry fruit supported by clean bright greenish tannins that flow into a clean rather green tannic berry fruit finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has medium red, purple in colour. It has tones of blackcurrant, violet and cedar aromas with touches of mint. The rich, ripe opulent but youthful palate has plummy fruit, a background of new oak and fine tannins.

Name: MV Gran Reserva Malbec
Wine Description: Deep red wine. Mild taste excellent wines reflect varietal characteristics of Malbec and filled with fruity notes of raspberry and plum. Aftertaste - elegant. Aroma of the wine reveals hints of plum and cherry jam and light oak nuances.

Name: Bien Nacido Estate Plantings Petit Verdot
Wine Description: Dense and inky yet with grace. Lovely Bordeaux characteristics along with a classic dark berry character and medium, dusty tannins. A variety known to have strong tannin, very dark color and a multitude of flavors and it is usually added to a Cabernet Sauvignon/Merlot blend and not bottled separately.

Name: Mother Clone Zinfandel
Wine Description: Our Mother Clone is a classic Dry Creek Valley Zinfandel with fragrant aromas of ripe berry and black plum with a touch of black pepper spice Concentrated blackberry and fig flavors are framed by subtle toasted oak with a dusty-spicy finish. Well integrated flavors with round tannins and bright acidity are a hallmark of our style. Enjoy now or cellar for three to five years.

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: An enormous wine, intense ruby-red with purple hues, with aromas that bespeak new casks-spices, smoke, liquorice and light hints of truffles. Noble tannins with concentrated, very intense flavours.

Name: La Petite Verdiere Côtes-du-Rhône
Winery: Domaine de La Bastide - Vincent & Stéphanie Boyer

Name: Armonía de Tintos
Wine Description: Ruby red color aroma that’s deep and complex and that stands out for its vanilla and roasted scents that come from its aging in French oak barrels this wine pairs perfectly with all types of cheese and dishes with strong sauces.

Name: Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: This Nebbiolo comes from each Nebbiolo, generally younger. Excellent structure with aromas typical of Barolo Bricco Boschis with hints mainly fruity floral then spicy, open and intense. Good attitude to aging. Food pairing: cold meats, red meat, grilled, grained hard cheeses or seasoned, chocolate.

Name: Nebbiolo
Wine Description: Deep red plum colour. Good adhesion wine by the glass which has thick, long and thick legs. Sophisticated and elegant. Intense aroma of great complexity, hints of ripe fruit, notes of wet earth. Great structure, good body, long finish, balanced acidity, firm tannins and elegant, woody fruity aftertaste.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ruby red in color, this Cabernet Sauvignon displays complex aromas of ripe blackberries. With hints of mocha, bittersweet chocolate, and flavors of juicy dark berry, its concentrated flavor is enhanced by firm, supple tannins.

Name: Lirac
Wine Description: It has characteristic to be quite spicy thanks to their terroir. They are characterized by their youth in red and black fruit, spice with an evolution in time, but also tobacco, undergrowth, pepper.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pinot Noir captures the best of Santa Barbara’s unique terroir with a fresh, light-bodied profile that allows the grape’s varietal character to shine through. An inviting, delicate perfume emerges from the glass, while bright red cherry and strawberry flavors lightly dance upon the palate.
